participant_1.background:
I wake up early, feed my cats, and read my favorite comic books before I start blogging.
I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
i am obsessed with my dog.
my desire is to becom a fashion designer.
I remember getting teased about my freckles when I was a kid, but I've grown to love them.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, but I'm looking to move to a warmer climate.
i believe in ghosts and have seen them on several occasions.
i live in pittsburgh.
i got engaged to be married in paris , france.
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.

content.text: Good morning! What's your favorite way to start the day?
Good morning to you! I usually wake up early, feed my cats and then read my favorite comic books before I start my day.
I love that! I love reading comic books too. I'm a huge DC fan. What's your favorite comic book?
I love DC too! I think my favorite comic book is Batman. I'm also a big fan of Marvel Comics.
I love Batman too! He's my favorite superhero. I also love Superman and Wonder Woman.
Me too! I love all the DC characters. I'm also a big fan of the Marvel characters.
I'm so glad we have something in common! It's always nice to meet a fellow comic book fan.
It is! I love talking about comic books with people who love them as much as I do.
Me too! I'm so glad we met!
Me too! Have a great day!
